messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Tim's Denim jumper & ugly shoes
messages.messageBody:
From: "Tia Leschke" <leschke@...>

<<I keep threatening to dye my hair purple for an orchestra concert
sometime.
(We have to wear all black.) Still haven't done it.>>


I've never een wanted to do a color like that. Just isn't in me I guess. I
love it on others though. I love the commercial with the older woman who's
hair comes out fuschia and still goes to Outback Steakhouse anyway!!

Anyway, I just went from really blond to almost black. I love it. Of course
it's not that dark now as the blond is coming through a bit. Different hair
color every day. Talk about me being bored. How can I now? And Joe gets to
go to bed with a different women every night and not get into trouble!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Tim's Denim jumper & ugly shoes
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey, I was old enough to stop wearing those awful things when I was 15! Actually I only wore them a few times anyway. ... mind. I keep threatening to dye
messages.messageBody:
> LOL!!! Old enough to not wear pointy toe high heels and young enough to
> still want people to look at me when I go out!!!

Hey, I was old enough to stop wearing those awful things when I was 15!
Actually I only wore them a few times anyway.
>
> Okay pink hair will get me looked at too but that's not what I had in
mind.

I keep threatening to dye my hair purple for an orchestra concert sometime.
(We have to wear all black.) Still haven't done it.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Tim's Denim jumper & ugly shoes
messages.msgSnippet: From:   Age and comfort go hand in hand! Damn looks all to hell!  Actually, some aren t half-bad.
messages.messageBody:
From: <kbcdlovejo@...>

<<MaryB---how young ARE you? <BWG>

Age and comfort go hand in hand! Damn looks all to hell! <G>

Actually, some aren't half-bad.>>


LOL!!! Old enough to not wear pointy toe high heels and young enough to
still want people to look at me when I go out!!!

Okay pink hair will get me looked at too but that's not what I had in mind.
<BG>

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Tim's Denim jumper & ugly shoes
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/12/2003 12:20:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... MaryB---how young ARE you?  Age and comfort go hand in hand! Damn looks all to hell!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/12/2003 12:20:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
mummy124@... writes:

> Yeah but aren't they all really ugly??

MaryB---how young ARE you? <BWG>

Age and comfort go hand in hand! Damn looks all to hell! <G>

Actually, some aren't half-bad.

~Kelly, the birk & naot queen, but who used to wear only "Joan & Davids"!
